original_text: A carpenter measures a piece of wood. Then he draws a shape for the image. He uses his tools to cut the wood. He carefully makes it have the right shape. He makes the image have the shape of a human. It looks like a beautiful person. Now it is ready to go in its special room. A carpenter measures a piece of wood. Then he draws a shape for the image. He uses his tools to cut the wood. He carefully makes it have the right shape. He makes the image have the shape of a human. It looks like a beautiful person. Now it is ready to go in its special room. A carpenter measures a piece of wood. Then he draws a shape for the image. He uses his tools to cut the wood. He carefully makes it have the right shape. He makes the image have the shape of a human. It looks like a beautiful person. Now it is ready to go in its special room.
korean_text: 목공은 줄을 늘여 재고 붓으로 긋고 대패로 밀고 곡선자로 그어 사람의 아름다움을 따라 사람의 모양을 만들어 집에 두게 하며

sentences.original_text: A carpenter measures a piece of wood.
Then he draws a shape for the image.
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 상을 위한 모양을 그립니다.

sentences.original_text: He uses his tools to cut the wood.
He carefully makes it have the right shape.
He makes the image have the shape of a human.
It looks like a beautiful person.
Now it is ready to go in its special room.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그것은 특별한 방에 들어갈 준비가 되었습니다.
